newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary's forint firms vs dlr,steady vs NBH basket.
newsitem.headline: Hungary's forint firms vs dlr,steady vs NBH basket.

text.p: Hungary's forint was steady against the central bank basket in slow morning trading on Tuesday, and firmed slightly against the dollar, tracking the dollar/mark cross, traders said.
The forint opened at 183.51/56 to the dollar, compared with Monday's closing of 183.43/50, but it firmed to 183.35/40 by 0855 GMT.
The forint was pinned to the National Bank of Hungary's (NBH) resistance level (bid) and was seen following the dollar/mark at the NBH bid.
(NBH basket: 30 percent dollar, 70 percent German mark. The NBH's floating intervention range is 4.5 percent wide.)
